title: Portrait
prompt: Ultra realistic portrait of a man in dramatic lighting, 85mm lens look, sharp focus.

prompt: Nighttime cyberpunk street scene, neon reflections on wet asphalt, cinematic wide shot.

prompt: Fantasy warrior concept art, dynamic pose, detailed armor and atmospheric rim light.
